title: Closure: A response to Miroslav Holub
abstract: A response to Miroslav Holub's essay on "Wisdom as a metaphor" related to the  professional domain of engineering which concludes that experience and action are needed to transform metaphorical expressions of wisdom into literal tenets
publisher: Department of Telematics/Metamorphosis - Centre for Writing and Performance Research
